'''Qingce Household Dish''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Qingce Stir Fry]] with [[Yaoyao]]. The [[recipe]] for Qingce Stir Fry is obtainable from [[Ms. Bai]] in [[Qingce Village]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Qingce Household Dish increases the party's ATK by '''274''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
